summary: This intimate documentary follows careers of two remarkable personalities: Carmen de Lavallade, a dynamic dancer and choreographer from California who moved to New York with Alvin Ailey and... See full summary »
cast: Carmen De Lavallade|Geoffrey Holder|Alvin Ailey|Josephine Baker|Clifton Brown|Janet Collins|Ulysses Dove|Jennifer Dunning|Ann Duquesnay|Carl Hall|Ira Hawkins|Boscoe Holder|Leo Holder|Judith Jamison|Eartha Kitt|Stephanie Mills|Ella Mitchell|Brianna Reed|Matthew Rushing|Glenn Allen Sims|Gus Solomons Jr.|James Truitte|Dudley Williams
title: Carmen and Geoffrey
